page.description: The FORM.PREVIEW() method displays the Preview dialog box showing the selected form. Public user defined function.
page.syntax: Form_Name as C = form.preview(C layoutname [,C filter [,C order [,L modal [,L session_modal [,* arguments [,* options ]]]]]])

argument.name: layoutname
argument.description: The name of the form to preview.

argument.name: filter
argument.description: Optional. Default = ".T." (All records). A character filter expression that evaluates to a logical value and selects the records to show in the dialog.

argument.name: order
argument.description: Optional. Default = record order. A character order expression that sorts selected records.

argument.name: modal
argument.description:
Optional. Default = .F.
.T. = The user cannot change focus without closing the dialog.
.F. = The user can change focus without closing the dialog.

argument.name: session_modal
argument.description:
Optional. Default = .T.
.T. = This means that any script that calls the FORM.PREVIEW() method will pause until the Print Preview window is closed. However, the preview window itself is not a modal dialog box. The user is free to select other windows in Alpha Five.
.F. = The script does not pause until the Print Preview window is closed.
